title: New Alphabet
content:
I've been playing with FontShop's FontStruct for the past two days. I decided to turn Wim Crouwel's New Alphabet into a font. I thought FontStruct set up would work in recreating Crouwel's design. Wanted to post it up here for feedback.

[http://fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/new\_alphabet](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131849/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/new_alphabet)

I also made an attempt at making New Alphabet more legible but sticking to the same principles.

here's that:  
 [http://fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/pentagrid\_alphabet](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131849/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/fontstructions/show/pentagrid_alphabet)
